inclusion.criterion: be recruited in the intervention group, if they and their relatives are willing to join in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the patient is between 18 and 80 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: aSAH is diagnosed by CTA, DSA or other cranial imaging examination
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is admitted to hospital within 72 hours after aSAH onset
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Aneurysm is clipped within 36 hours after admission
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient and his/her relatives are informed and agree to accept the above treatment plan
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Cause of the SAH is not rupture of an intracranial aneurysm
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Time from SAH onset to admission is longer than 72 hours
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has V. cholerae in stool, but no fever or blood in stool.
